### [Creating a switch condition](/documentation/AppIntents/ParameterSummarySwitchCondition/init(_:_:)-6cdw3#Creating-a-switch-condition)

[`init(ParameterSummarySwitchCondition<Intent, Value, CaseCondition>.WidgetFamily, () -> CaseCondition)`](/documentation/appintents/parametersummaryswitchcondition/init(_:_:)-4vxvs)Initializes a parameter summary Switch statement over widget family.[`enum ParameterSummaryCaseBuilder`](/documentation/appintents/parametersummarycasebuilder)A result builder that allows you to declaratively describe the cases of a switch statement in a parameter summary.[`enum WidgetFamily`](/documentation/appintents/parametersummaryswitchcondition/widgetfamily)An enum that represents a parameter summary Switch statement over widget family.
